content.question: Which of the following characteristics does the author anticipate may be true of some members of the audience?

choices.label: They are more familiar with Euro-American accounts of Crazy Horse than with Lakota accounts.
They have a detailed knowledge of the military campaigns of General George Crook and Lieutenant Colonel George Custer.
They have a basic understanding of the combat tactics used by Lakota warriors.
They are skeptical of the idea that the qualities of a good leader vary from one culture to another.

content.answer: They are more familiar with Euro-American accounts of Crazy Horse than with Lakota accounts.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
